verses.text: Oh \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* wouldest rend \w the|strong="H6440"\w* heavens, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* wouldest \w come|strong="H3045"\w* \w down|strong="H6440"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* mountains might \w quake|strong="H7264"\w* \w at|strong="H6440"\w* \w thy|strong="H3045"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*,

\w as|strong="H6213"\w* \w when|strong="H6213"\w* fire kindleth \w the|strong="H6440"\w* brushwood, \add and\add* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* fire causeth \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w waters|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* boil; \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w thy|strong="H6213"\w* name \w known|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w thine|strong="H6440"\w* adversaries, \w that|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w nations|strong="H6440"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* tremble \w at|strong="H6213"\w* \w thy|strong="H6213"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*!

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* \w didst|strong="H6213"\w* \w terrible|strong="H6213"\w* \w things|strong="H3808"\w* \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w*, \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* camest down, \w the|strong="H8085"\w* mountains quaked \w at|strong="H6213"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* \w presence|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w For|strong="H6213"\w* \w from|strong="H2398"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w old|strong="H5769"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* have \w not|strong="H6213"\w* heard, nor perceived \w by|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* ear, neither hath \w the|strong="H6213"\w* eye seen \w a|strong="H3068"\w* God besides \w thee|strong="H6213"\w*, \w who|strong="H6213"\w* \w worketh|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H6213"\w* waiteth \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w Thou|strong="H1961"\w* meetest \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* rejoiceth \w and|strong="H6666"\w* worketh \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* remember thee \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w thy|strong="H5375"\w* ways: behold, \w thou|strong="H1961"\w* wast wroth, \w and|strong="H6666"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* sinned: \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5375"\w* \add have we been\add* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w long|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w*; \w and|strong="H6666"\w* \w shall|strong="H7307"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* saved?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w become|strong="H7121"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H4480"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H8034"\w* unclean, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* righteousnesses \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* polluted garment: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* \w do|strong="H3027"\w* fade \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* leaf; \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H4480"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w*, \w like|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wind, \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w away|strong="H4127"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w none|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* calleth \w upon|strong="H3027"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* name, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* stirreth \w up|strong="H3605"\w* \w himself|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H3027"\w* hold \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thee|strong="H3027"\w*; \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w thou|strong="H3027"\w* hast hid \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* face \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hast consumed \w us|strong="H3027"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w means|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* iniquities.

\w But|strong="H5971"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* \w art|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* Father; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* clay, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w thou|strong="H5704"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* potter; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* work \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* hand.

\w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* wroth very sore, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*, neither remember iniquity \w for|strong="H3389"\w* ever: behold, look, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* beseech thee, \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H5892"\w* all thy people.

\w Thy|strong="H1984"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* cities \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wilderness, Zion \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wilderness, Jerusalem \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w desolation|strong="H2723"\w*.

\w Our|strong="H3068"\w* holy \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* beautiful house, \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* fathers praised thee, \w is|strong="H3068"\w* burned \w with|strong="H3068"\w* fire; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* pleasant places \w are|strong="H3068"\w* laid waste.
Wilt thou refrain thyself for these things, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w*? wilt thou hold thy peace, and afflict us very sore?
